message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $110 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $90 is a little too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $95.  Let's split the difference and make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $95 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $92.50.
